browserRules: NEVER have duplicate domains - ONE tab per site (1 Shopify, 1 BuckyDrop, 1 1688)
ALWAYS check open tabs first before opening ANY new tab
NAVIGATE within existing tab instead of opening new one
duplicateRules: Check DRAFTS + LISTED products before any product work
Search by title keywords, not exact match
If similar exists, skip - don't waste time
efficiencyRules: Never idle - always have next task ready
Work on highest ROI task first
